entry.title: โI use art to raise awareness of Armeniaโs rich culture,โ Stephany Sanossian

media:group.media:title: โI use art to raise awareness of Armeniaโs rich culture,โ Stephany Sanossian
media:group.media:description:
In this episode of Mindful Leaders, we explore the life of Stephany Sanossian, an artist and designer. Born in Aleppo, Syria, to Armenian parents with ancestral roots from Aintab, Stephany is an artist with a background in design. She left Syria to pursue her studies and passion in Barcelona, after which she settled in Dubai. Stephanyโs life journey is a testament to her passion for and dedication to tradition combined with innovation. Her artwork interlaces the charm of Middle Eastern and Armenian art with contemporary flavors, complexities, and perspectives. Her collages and installations have gained global recognition and are showcased in exhibitions and pavilions worldwide. In this episode, we discuss the role of nostalgia and collective memories, the greater importance of human connections, and a vision for a more authentic and meaningful life.
About Stephany Sanossian Stephany Sanossian is renowned for her captivating pop art installations that delve into the complexities of identity, colors, and mosaics. Originating from Dubai's vibrant art scene, her work has captivated audiences by seamlessly intertwining the charm of Middle Eastern and Armenian art with a contemporary twist, effectively bridging the realms of tradition and innovation. Her artistic journey is deeply rooted in cherished childhood memories from Syria, instilling her work with a profound blend of nostalgia and insights. Stephany's collages merge pop culture icons, local heritage landmarks, and expansive skylines with traditional Damascene mosaic and pattern designs, inviting viewers to reconceptualize their perspectives. Her installations reflect the fluidity of societal transitions, encapsulating the essence of a culture undergoing continuous transformation. Her work challenges established artistic norms, infusing contemporary pop culture elements with the spirit of Middle Eastern heritage. Stephany has a Master's degree in Research for Design and Innovation from Elisava, Barcelona, Spain.
Program Overview Mindful Leaders dives into the stories of people who have achieved prominence, walked incredible journeys, and have defined culture.
Lara sits down with specialists, thinkers, and change catalysts to deconstruct insights, events, and lessons that have shaped their personal and professional lives and have enabled them to create meaning and connection.

ีึีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีดีกีตึีกึีกีฒีกึ ินีขีซีฌีซีฝีซีธึีด ีซึีกีพีซีณีกีฏีจ ีทีกึีธึีถีกีฏีธึีด ีง ีฌีกึีพีกีฎ ีดีถีกีฌึ ิฝีธึีฐึีคีกึีกีถีจ ีฅึึีธึีค, ีพีฅึีปีถีกีฏีกีถ ีจีถีฉีฅึึีดีกีดีข ีจีถีคีธึีถีฅีฌ ีง ยซีีฟีกึีฅึีฏึีตีก ีฃีธึีฎีกีฏีกีฌีถีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถยป ึ ึีซีถีกีฃีซีฎีจ, ีธึีซ ีฉีซึีกีญีธึีด ีฐีกีฝีกึีกีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีถ ีธึ ีฌึีกีฟีพีกีดีซีปีธึีถีฅึีถ ีฅีถึ ีีกีญีกีฃีกีฐ ีีกีฌีธีดีฅ ิถีธึึีกีขีซีทีพีซีฌีซีถ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีฅีฌ ีง, ีธึ ึ ึีซีถีกีฃีฎีซ ีถีฏีกีฟีดีกีดีข ีพีฅีฟีธ ีฏีฏีซึีกีผีซึ

ิฒีผีถีซ ีฟีฅีฒีกีฐีกีถีพีกีฎ ีกึึีกีญึีซีถีฅึีจ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ีกีผีฅึีฅีฝีพีธึีด ีฅีถ ีฅึีฏีธึ ีฐีซีดีถีกีฏีกีถ ีญีถีคึีซี ีขีถีกีฏีกึีกีถีถีฅึีซ ีขีกึีฑึ ีพีกึีฑีกีพีณีกึีถีฅึ ึ ีฃีธึีฎีกีฆึีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถึ ีีฅีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีฅีฏีกีดีธึีฟีถีฅึีซ ีฏีธีดีซีฟีฅีธึีด ีดีกึีฟีซ 27-ีซ ีคึีธึีฉีตีกีดีข ีถีธึีตีถีกีฏีกีถีกึีพีฅีฌ ีง ิฑึึีกีญีซึ ีฟีฅีฒีกีฐีกีถีพีกีฎ 13 197 ีพีกึีฑีธึ/ีบีกีตีดีกีถีกีฃึีกีตีซีถ ีฐีซีดีธึีถึีถีฅึีธีพ ีฐีกีทีพีกีผีพีกีฎ ึีกีฒีกึีกึีซึ ิฒีผีถีซ ีฟีฅีฒีกีฐีกีถีพีกีฎ ีกึึีกีญึีซีถีฅึีซ ีทึีปีกีถีธึีด ีฃีธึีฎีกีฆึีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีบีกีฟีณีกีผีถีฅึีซึ ีดีฅีฏีถ ีง, ีธึ ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฅึีฏีกึีกีฑีฃีฅึ 40+10 ีฐีกีฆีกึ ีคึีกีด ีฝีธึีซีกีฌีกีฏีกีถ ีกีปีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฎึีกีฃีซึีจึ

ีีกีตีฏีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีฅีกีถ ึีธึีฑีกีผีธึีฉีฅีกีถ ีบีกีฏีกีฝีจ ีฝึีซึีผึีกีฐีกีต ีฅึีซีฟีกีฝีกึีคีจ ีฏีจ ึีถีฟีผีง ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีดีงีป, ีกีตีฝ ีฐีกีดีธีฆีธึีดีจ ีธึีถีซ ีีกึีซีฆีซ ยซีีธึ ี ีกีผีกีปยป ีฉีฅึีฉีซ ีญีดีขีกีฃีซึ, ิตึีฅึีกีถีซ ีดีงีป ยซีีธึ ี ีกีผีกีปยป ีกึีฅึีดีฟีกีฐีกีตีฅึีงีถ ีฏีฅีคึีธีถีซ ีฐีซีดีถีกีคีซึ ิบีซึีกีตึ ีีธีฌีกึีฅีกีถึ

entry.title: Scores detained as anti-government protests continue in Armenia

media:group.media:title: Scores detained as anti-government protests continue in Armenia
media:group.media:description:
๐ At least 151 protesters were detained today in Yerevan for taking part in acts of civil disobedience, according to police figures. Demonstrators continue to call on Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan to resign over last monthโs border deal with Azerbaijan. ๐ Armenia and Azerbaijan continue to disagree on key provisions of a normalization deal, after talks over the weekend between the two countriesโ top diplomats in Kazakhstan.
